程序包 si.model

类 Player

java.lang.Object
si.model.Player
所有已实现的接口:
Hittable
public class Player extends Object implements Hittable
The Player class represents the player's ship in the Asteroids game.

    • isHit

      public boolean isHit(Bullet b)
      Checks if the player's ship is hit by a bullet.
      指定者:
      isHit 在接口中 Hittable
      参数:
      b - The bullet to check for a hit.
      返回:
      True if the ship is hit, false otherwise.
